source: Relaţii suplimentare se pot obţine la Serviciul Resurse Umane al IPJ Vâlcea, la numerele de telefon: 0250.703.112, 0250.703.127 sau 0250.703.113.
target: Further information can be obtained from the Human Resources Department of IPJ Vâlcea, at the phone numbers: 0250.703.112, 0250.703.127, or 0250.703.113.
